body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.have Rancor attached to a creature
2.that creature goes to the graveyard 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Rancor should go to your hand but ends up in the graveyard instead What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.43 on Mac Mountain Lion If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Dwayne...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/117779160227519969928/)
title: Card Rancor miscoded

comments.body:
Thanks for catching this. Fixed in e8e3004132e2

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [Dwayne...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/117779160227519969928/) on November 09, 2013 05:17:23_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.have Rancor attached to a creature
2.that creature goes to the graveyard 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Rancor should go to your hand but ends up in the graveyard instead What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.43 on Mac Mountain Lion If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=418_
